attributes.action: call on the Post Office to stop the closure of Lambeth Walk post office, 34 Vauxhall Street, London SE11 5LG
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our local post office

We, the local community of Vauxhall Gardens Estate and the surrounding community, oppose the closure of Lambeth Walk post office, 34 Vauxhall Street, London SE11 5LG. 

Please sign our petition below.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " call on the Post Office to stop the closure of Lambeth Walk post office, 34 Vauxhall Street, London SE11 5LG."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15515.asp

Prime Minister's Office
